lines.text: Another person's trouble can lift the mind, Felicia.

Murder?... We're not in this world to cause pain, dear. Of course - you have to think of yourself on occasion. I'm not saying you don't. But there are other people, too. Which is something you're daily more aware of as you grow older.
No one's blaming you, dear. Things - happen. Things take a turn. We live in a miracle. That's the promise. That's the future. The pain will wash away. The healing will commence.
Purity itself can surely wash the pain away.
His mother's trying to keep him away from me.
